page.title: 15 Brookfield
page.content:
{Organisation { {The organisation of the school is {based on a delegated stucture from the {headmaster through the two deputy {heads heads to the four heads of {house and heads subjects departments {about matters relating to progress in {studies, behaviour and attitude. {A school matron is in full time {attendance to handle medical affairs. { {School Uniform
It is expected that all pupils will wear school uniform.It has been designed to be up to date without going to extreme but they have failed dismally. { }
